attributes.action: Turn our street lights back on in North Bristol!
attributes.additional_details:
PUT OUR LIGHTS BACK ON!
We are feeling UNSAFE at night walking to our own homes, down our own streets, around our own area!
We request South Gloucestershire council turn our street lighting back on from Dusk to Dawn! We pay our council tax and we should have the right to lit footpaths and to be able to go to and from work without the fear of what could easily be lurking in the pitch black alley ways and unlit public footpaths such as the little stoke path that follows all the way around little stoke. Some of us even work nightshifts and no longer have the security of street lights to find us safely to our front doors.
We want to feel safe! Give us back our street lighting at night!
